abilities.name: Light Conduct
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), if you have Illumise in play, you may search your discard pile for a Supporter card, show it to your opponent, and put it on top of your deck. This power can't be used if Volbeat is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Firefly Light
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Confused.
